stepTitle:
Consider the following reaction:

2NO(g) + $$\operatorname{O_2}\left(gight)$$ ⇌ $$2\operatorname{NO_2}\left(gight)$$

The standard enthalpy change, ΔH°, for the reaction is $$-114$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$, and the standard entropy change, ΔS°, is $$-146$$ J/mol∙K.

Calculate the temperature range in which the reaction is spontaneous.
choices: The reaction is not spontaneous at any temperature.
